parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Elements per page

parameters.name: filters[id]
parameters.description: Return item(s) with the specified IDs.

parameters.name: filters[anticipated_delivery_date]
parameters.description: Array of dates (date range). Returns item(s) with their anticipated delivery date within the specified dates. A single date is also accepted. style: form

parameters.name: filters[ball_in_court_id]
parameters.description: User ID. Return item(s) where the specified User ID is the Ball in Court.

parameters.name: filters[ball_in_court_company_id]
parameters.description: Company ID. Return item(s) where the specified Company ID is the Ball in Court.

parameters.name: filters[closed_at]
parameters.description:
Return item(s) that are due within the specified ISO 8601 datetime range.
Formats:
`YYYY-MM-DD`...`YYYY-MM-DD` - Date
`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`...`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ` - DateTime with UTC Offset
`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+XX:00`...`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+XX:00` - Datetime with Custom Offset

parameters.name: filters[created_at]
parameters.description:
Return item(s) created within the specified ISO 8601 datetime range.
Formats:
`YYYY-MM-DD`...`YYYY-MM-DD` - Date
`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`...`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ` - DateTime with UTC Offset
`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+XX:00...`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+XX:00` - Datetime with Custom Offset

parameters.name: filters[query]
parameters.description: Return item(s) containing search query

parameters.name: filters[received_from_id]
parameters.description: Received From ID

parameters.name: filters[responsible_contractor_id]
parameters.description: Return item(s) with the specified Responsible Contractor ID.

parameters.name: filters[specification_section_id]
parameters.description: Array of Specification Section IDs. A single Specification Section ID is also accepted.

parameters.name: filters[approver_id]
parameters.description: Array of User IDs. Return item(s) where the specified User IDs are in the approver list. A single integer is also accepted.

parameters.name: filters[current_revision]
parameters.description: Default false. If true, only current revisions are shown. If false, all submittals are shown, regardless of whether or not it is the current revision.

parameters.name: filters[division]
parameters.description: Array of Divisions to filter on. A Division is the first two digits from the Specification Section Number. A single Division is also accepted.

parameters.name: filters[location_id]
parameters.description: Array of Location IDs. A single Location ID is also accepted.

parameters.name: filters[submittal_manager_id]
parameters.description: Array of Submittal Manager IDs. A single Submittal Manager ID is also accepted.

parameters.name: filters[submittal_package_id]
parameters.description: Array of Submittal Package IDs. Returns item(s) associated with the specified Submittal Package IDs. A single integer value is also accepted.

parameters.name: filters[response_id]
parameters.description: Array of Response IDs. A single Response ID is also accepted.

parameters.name: filters[status_id]
parameters.description: Array of Status IDs. A single Status ID is also accepted.

parameters.name: filters[type]
parameters.description: Array of Submittal Types. A single Submittal Type is also accepted.

parameters.name: filters[updated_at]
parameters.description:
Return item(s) last updated within the specified ISO 8601 datetime range.
Formats:
`YYYY-MM-DD`...`YYYY-MM-DD` - Date
`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`...`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ` - DateTime with UTC Offset
`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+XX:00`...`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS+XX:00` - Datetime with Custom Offset

parameters.name: filters[unpackaged]
parameters.description: Parseable to boolean value, filters out unpackaged Submittals.

parameters.name: filters[number]
parameters.description: Array of Numbers. A single Number is also accepted.

parameters.name: filters[has_operation_errors]
parameters.description: Parseable to boolean value, filters Submittals based on whether they have operation errors from bulk operations.

parameters.name: filters[operation_errors_by_operation_id]
parameters.description: Filters Submittals that have operation errors associated with specific operation ID(s). Accepts single or multiple operation IDs.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Structure to sort submittal rows

parameters.name: show_attachments
parameters.description: Determine the AttachmentVisible tag value(depend on configurable field set).

parameters.name: Procore-Company-Id
parameters.description: Unique company identifier associated with the Procore User Account.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the company.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the project.

summary: Return a list of all Submittals.
description: Return a list of all Submittals.
